description:
Accusations of criminal charges can cause enormous stress and anxiety in a person's life. A conviction can be even more damaging. Parker Law, LLC, a criminal defense law firm in Salem, Missouri, defends the accused against the most heinous of accusations. We know that a conviction can result in lifelong repercussions, including the loss of work opportunities, damaged relationships and, ultimately, the loss of freedom. Attorney Kelly Parker uses his unique experience - which includes nearly 20 years as a retired Circuit Court trial judge and several others as a prosecuting attorney - to guide clients through the pitfalls of the judicial system and toward a favorable outcome.

Our law firm has the confidence and capabilities to tackle cases from which most other offices shy away. In other words, we do not defend individuals against minor parking ticket offices. Our standard caseload includes misdemeanors and felony offenses of the following nature:

  • Murder
  • Manslaughter
  • Violent crimes
  • Rape
  • Sex Offenses
  • Assault
  • Robbery
  • DWI/DUI
  • Weapon offenses
  • Possession of controlled substances
  • Probation violations
  • White collar crimes

Mr. Parker likes to consider himself and his team the champions for underdogs. In addition to criminal defense, he defends plaintiffs in personal injury cases that involve car accidents, trucking accidents, premises liability incidences, medical malpractice, workers' compensation and wrongful death.

Parker Law, LLC, is a client-focused law firm. Mr. Parker understands the importance of a strong attorney-client relationship and uses the free initial consultation for both parties to gauge the success of a potential partnership. He welcomes virtual appointments and accepts credit cards as payment.
